Sentencas: The need for standardisation/quality assurance (QA) is argued for citing extant problems with consistency, repeatability and reliability of data.
Titulo: A review of standardising SOFC measurement and quality assurance at FZJ

Sentencas: A review of the cell testing procedure/QA system used at Forschungszentrum Julich (FZJ) is given including an outline of how the FZJ system was developed.
Titulo: A review of standardising SOFC measurement and quality assurance at FZJ

Sentencas: This is put in the context of more extensive QA systems following the outlines of the ISO 9000 series standards.
Titulo: A review of standardising SOFC measurement and quality assurance at FZJ

Sentencas: Examples are used to illustrate how and why a number of standard cell test parameters was adopted.
Titulo: A review of standardising SOFC measurement and quality assurance at FZJ

Sentencas: It was found that pre-normative research used to define testing parameters led to an improvement in cell performance generally.
Titulo: A review of standardising SOFC measurement and quality assurance at FZJ

Sentencas: Therefore, it is recommended that other solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) labs develop standardisation in testing and QA systems to maintain and improve their measurement processes.
Titulo: A review of standardising SOFC measurement and quality assurance at FZJ
